entry.title: Explosion Shuts Crucial Bridge Between Crimea and Russia
entry.content: The blast disrupted a key artery for the supply of fuel, military equipment and food to Russian troops fighting to hold ground in southern Ukraine. Russian officials were quick to blame Kyiv.

entry.title: Russia's Attacks on Ukrainian Dam, Power Stations Signal a Tactical Shift
entry.content: The strikes on civilian infrastructure mark a new phase in the war, with flooding and freezing winter temperatures turned into weapons.

entry.title: Himars Transform the Battle for Ukraine---and Modern Warfare
entry.content: The mobile, high-precision U.S. rocket system is thwarting Russia’s invasion as it revolutionizes military strategy.

entry.title: After Thailand Mass Shooting, Families Grieve Loss of Children
entry.content: The rampage that left 36 people dead at a child-care center in the country’s northeast has shattered a rural community.
